name: Chou Iwai's Wonderful Garden
description:
Moxie Odr is tasked with exploring a house to find a specific item.
Despite it being easy to break into the house, she is met with a cult led by the mysterious and toxic Chou Iwai, who tells her what Moxie is looking for lies in her garden. Will she be able to find what she's looking for? Or succumb to the cult's ideals and the garden itself?

===============================================================

This is an RPG Maker Vx Ace horror game created for the RPG Horror Celebration Jam #3! 

This game currently stands as a demo!
Currently plans for a full game are up in the air, but that is too be determined. Please support the people who have helped make this project demo possible!

Also, please make sure Rpg maker VX Ace RTP is downloaded or the game will not run!

Gameplay: 15+ minutes.

Story by: Horrorbox

Music by: Thimras
Art by: Crimson
